grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 吹奏楽【スイソウガク】wind music, wind instrument music
推挙【スイキョ】recommendation (of a person for a position), nomination
kun reading compounds: 吹く【ふく】to blow (e.g. wind), to play a wind instrument, to whistle, to laugh, to burst into laughter, to smelt, to mint, to brag, to talk big
